zep_eval_test_user_001.question: What is my dog's name?
zep_eval_test_user_001.context:
# RETRIEVED CONTEXT FROM ZEP GRAPH SEARCH

## Episodes (Conversation Segments):
- (2025-10-30T20:35:42.202559Z) I just adopted a golden retriever puppy named Max from the shelter last Tuesday.
- (2025-10-30T20:35:42.202559Z) That's wonderful! Golden retrievers are great family dogs. How old is Max?
- (2025-10-30T20:35:42.202559Z) He's 3 months old. I scheduled his first vet appointment for next Friday at Dr. Peterson's clinic on Maple Street.
- (2025-10-30T20:35:42.202559Z) Will do. I also signed him up for puppy training classes that start on April 1st at PetSmart. They're every Saturday morning at 9am.
- (2025-10-30T20:35:42.202559Z) Thanks! My daughter Sarah is so excited. She's been wanting a dog for her 8th birthday, which was last month in February.
